bug.cf_doc_type: If docs needed, set a value

long_desc.thetext: The 4.0.0 release should happen in the next week or two, with 4.0.1 coming in June/July. 4.0.0 has some important changes (register spilling implementation) for radv, and in general the AMD graphics stack prefers a newer LLVM.

(In reply to Tom Stellard from comment #0) > The 4.0.0 release should happen in the next week or two, with 4.0.1 coming > in June/July. 4.0.0 has some important changes (register spilling > implementation) for radv, and in general the AMD graphics stack prefers a > newer LLVM.
How much it breaks this time? Any patches?
Created attachment 1258392 Patch to bump version to 4.0.0-rc2
This package has changed ownership in the Fedora Package Database. Reassigning to the new owner of this component.
